revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SparkLAN |model=EP-6800 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WHAPC-100GE |manuf_rev=V04 |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=MXF-HAP930819G |ic_id= |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712 |cpu1_cspeed=200 |cpu2_brand=Conexant |cpu2_model=CX90010-11 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug 1.0,Powerline |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:14:A5 |oui_eth=00:14:A5 }} {{TagLine|Powerline/HomePlug|54Mbps Wireless-G Access Point}}
"WHAPC-100GE_V04" and "109-102-4601" is silkscreened on the top :of the board of a sample production unit. *The WiFi radio is using a '''SiGe''' SE2529L / 2529L power amplifier IC. :There is one larger '''HITANO''' capacitor in the PSU side of the board. :Two '''Chemicon''' capacitors are on the digital side. *The Flash and RAM is on the back side of the board.. which is not easily accessible :(would require desoldering the power leads or completely destroying the case). :See also [[SparkLAN WX-6800-II]].. *[http://www.geeks.com/details.asp?invtid=EP-6800 ''SparkLAN EP-6800'' on '''Geeks''']
